sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { View, SafeAreaView  } from "react-native"
import { Text, Block,Button } from 'galio-framework'
import { AntDesign } from '@expo/vector-icons'; 

import styles from '../../styles/styles'

const Login = ()=>{
    return (<SafeAreaView >
        <View style={styles.flexContainerColumn} >
            
            <Block style={[{marginTop:"25%", marginHorizontal:"10%"}, styles.container]}>
                <Text h1 style={{textAlign:"center"}}>BudgetHero</Text>
            </Block> 

            <Block style={[ styles.container,{marginTop:"25%", marginHorizontal:"10%", backgroundColor:"#BEC4F0"},]}>
                <Text h4 style={{textAlign:"center"}}>Login To Your account</Text>
                <View style={[styles.flexContainerRow, {marginHorizontal:"10%",}]}>
                    <AntDesign name="google" size={44} color="black" style={{marginTop:8}} />
                    <Button color="#F07F1C">Connect With Google</Button>
                </View> 
            </Block> 
        </View>
    </SafeAreaView>)
}
export default Login
